text: Yury Rafaelovich Dokhoian (; 26 October 1964 â€“ 1 July 2021) was a Russian Grandmaster of chess (1988). On 1 July 2021, Dokhoian died in Moscow from COVID-19 at the age of 56. ==References== ==Other websites== *Grandmaster Games Database - Yury Dokhoian *Yury Dokhoian - Articles - New In Chess *Chessmetrics Player Profile: Yury Dokhoian Category:1964 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow Category:Russian chess players Category:People from Altai Krai
